mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member(member_id, member_pwd, opt) values(#{member_id}, #{member_pwd}, #{opt})
mapper.select: select count(member_id) from tbl_member where member_id = #{member_id}
select * from tbl_member where member_id = #{member_id} and member_pwd = #{member_pwd}
select count(member_id) from tbl_member where rownum > 0
